name: Arknights Blemishine 3in1 (明日方舟 瑕光)
description:
LoRA of Blemishine in Arknights, works between 0.6-0.9

明日方舟的瑕光, 在0.6-0.9的权重内表现良好

-

Support 3 sets of Official Outfit, other outfits are also available

支持三套官方外观的生成, 别的也可以生成

-

Original Outfit-EI-精1= ”OriginalOutfit1, light armor, plate armor“

Original Outfit-EII-精2= ”OriginalOutfit2, white long dress, armor“

Moon Catastrborn-异月灾嗣= ”MoonCatastrborn, dark armor“

- prompts required in low weights 在低权重时需要的词条=“animal ears, tail, blond hair”

-

Next might be Ambriel or McDonald Magallan

下一个应该是安比尔或者麦当劳 麦哲伦

-

Feel free to post any idea or character model request in the Discussion

有模型的需求可以B站私信或者在这里留言给我

id：不吃青蛙的阿龙

有空就会做

If you like my work, feel free to support me on patreon.com/RiuKiMK1

or RiuKi_MK1 is Creating AI artworks, LoRa models (buymeacoffee.com)
